::: {#exr-sister-tear-ship}
Make many like this:

- Simplify $\int_{-t}^{t}1\ dx$

- $\int_a^b 1 dx

- $\int_0^x 3 t^2\ dt$

- $\int_a^b f(x)\ dx + \int_b^a f(y)\ dy$

- $\int_1^x \frac{1}{t}\ dt$

- $\int_0^{t^2} \omega \cos(\omega t)\ dt$ -> $\sin(\omega t^2)$

- $\partial_x \int dnorm(x)\ dx$ is dnorm(x)

- $\partial_t \int pnorm(x)\ dx$ is 0

- $\int e^{a + bt}\ dt$

:::
